        public void addWeapon​(WeaponCard weapon)
               throws MaxCardsInHandException
        Adds a weapon to your hand when you do not have to discard one
        Parameters:
        weapon - thw weapon you want to add
        Throws:
        MaxCardsInHandException - if you already have 3 cards but you have not decided to discard one

        discardWeapon - the weapon to be replaced

      • addPowerup

        public boolean addPowerup​(PowerupCard powerup)
        Returns true if you can add the powerup to your hand, false instead
        Parameters:
        powerup - the powerup to be added
        Returns:
        true if the powerup can be added to your hando, false if not (your hand already has 3 powerups)
